title: cant install on vista
body: When i tray to install lol on my pc it just ask me: Are you sure you want to cancel league of legends installation. When i press No the setup screen restarts from scratch.

replies.body: There could be a few issues here like security settings blocking the install.  Your OS is a bit older too, so you could be missing necessary products for installation.  For this, make sure your OS is totally up to date!  You'll then want to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is allowed to be written to your drive.  I hope that helps!
